rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Some boxes contain four numbers between adjacent cells that are the result of a different mathematical operation (+, -, *, /) of the digits in those cells.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Some boxes contain four numbers between adjacent cells that are the result of a different mathematical operation (+, -, *, /) of the digits in those cells.
